resources.string: 1. Print out this document (and/or put it on a USB stick or external drive).\n2. Fill in your Master Password below.\n3. Store your kit in a secure place that you can quickly access at any time, e.g. a safe deposit box.
Important to note that we don’t keep and can’t restore your password. Please make sure\nyou keep your password in a safe place, and nobody else would have access to it.
Scan the code of Demo apps to\nset up your account quickly
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission must be granted. It\'s \"out of scope\" of this demo application, so you should do it manually.
